actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to amend section 8 of the Watershed Protection and Flood Prevention Act to increase the amount that may be made available under such section for a single plan for works of improvement.

summary.text: Increases from $5,000,000 to $10,000,000 the amount that may be made available by the Farmers Home Administration, under the Watershed Protection and Flood Prevention Act, for a single watershed project.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 8 of the Watershed Protection and Flood Prevention Act to increase the amount that may be made available under such section for a single plan for works of improvement.
